sentences.english: Try to make at least three people smile a day.
sentences.chinese: 请大显身手，每天至少引领三个人开心张笑口。

sentences.english: The PLA Air Force small test their skills in front of a firm footing.

sentences.english: This is where the registry steps in.
sentences.chinese: 这正是注册中心大显身手的地方。

sentences.english: It also includes many team cooperations.
sentences.chinese: 它又是一场一展身手的团队协作。

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是个好色的纨绔子弟，但身手矫捷，精明能干。

sentences.english: We're all just waiting with breath to see what you can do around here.
sentences.chinese: 我们都在屏息以待，指望您在这儿大展身手咧。

sentences.english: Just bought back, I was eager to pull dad try to square.
sentences.chinese: 刚买回来，我就迫不及待地拉着爸爸到广场一试身手。

sentences.english: The audience was hyped up when Richard had his innings.
sentences.chinese: 当轮到理查显身手的时候，观众开始激动起来了。

sentences.english: Despite its agility, the cat faces particular dangers in today's modern cities.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身手矫捷，但猫在今天的现代城市中却极其危险。

sentences.english: The monkey came down in great haste, for it wished to try this new game that it had just been studying.
sentences.chinese: 这只猴子急不可耐地跳下来，想一试身手，现学现卖。

sentences.english: Lately he has been trying his hand at poetry.
sentences.chinese: 最近王教伟正努力在诗歌领域一试身手。

sentences.english: Many foreigners are also determined to have a try at them.
sentences.chinese: 很多外国人也想在武术上一试身手。

sentences.english: He saw her for a some minutes, then lent her brush and proven his assistance.
sentences.chinese: 他观察了几分钟，然后向她借了画笔并一试身手。

sentences.english: I am a huge fan of golf.
sentences.chinese: 爱好者提供一显身手的机会。

sentences.english: He watched her for a few minutes, adidas Copa Mundial, then borrowed her brush and tried his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他观察了几分钟，然后向她借了画笔并一试身手。

sentences.english: Color psychologists also work in the decorating field.
